July 15, 2024, Has Taken On Record The Re-Opened And Re-Casted Standalone Financial Statements Of The Company For The Five Financial Years Ending (I) March 31, 2014, (Ii) March 31, 2015, (Iii) March 31, 2016, (Iv) March 31, 2017 And (V) March 31, 2018.

data.caption: Intimation Pursuant To Regulation Reg. 32 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: The Company has not issued any new securities during the quarter ended June 30, 2024. Hence Reg 32 is not applicable to the Company.

data.caption: Termination Of Concession Agreement Of MP Border Checkpost Development Project Developed By MP Border Checkpost Development Company Limited, Subsidiary Of The Company.
data.news_body: Madhya Pradesh Road Development Company Limited has issued a Termination Notice to MP Border Checkpost Development Company Limited vide letter dated June 28, 2024.

data.caption: Striking Off Of Elsamex SAU, A Subsidiary Of The Company From The Registry By The Registrar Of Spain Pursuant To Declaration Of Its Insolvency By The Court Of Madrid, Spain.
data.news_body: The Company hereby informs that Elsamex SAU, Spain, a wholly subsidiary (WOS) of ITNL International Pte. Limited, Singapore (IIPL) which in turn is a WOS of the Company has been struck off the Companies Register on May 29, 2024 by the Colegio de Registradores de Espana (Registrar of Spain).

data.caption: Compliances-Reg.24(A)-Annual Secretarial Compliance
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 24A of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Annual Secretarial Compliance Report issued by KDA & Associates (Formerly known as KDT & Associates), Practicing Company Secretary, for the Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2024.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Diversification / Disinvestment
data.news_body: IL&FS Transportation Networks Limited has informed the Exchange about execution of Share Purchase Agreement for sale of 14.5% equity stake held in Moradabad Bareilly Expressway Limited, erstwhile subsidiary of the Company.

data.caption: IL&FS Transportation Networks Ltd reply to clarification sought by the exchange
data.news_body:
The Exchange had sought clarification from IL&FS Transportation Networks Ltd with reference to the media report appearing on https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/services/property-/-cstruction/nclt-allows-ilfs-transportation-networks-to-offload-shares-in-an-expressway-project/articleshow/110234663.cms (Source:https://economictimes.indiatimes.com) dated May 18, 2024, titled NCLT allows IL&FS Transportation Networks to offload shares in an expressway project

IL&FS Transportation Networks Ltd response is enclosed.

data.caption: Clarification sought from IL&FS Transportation Networks Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from IL&FS Transportation Networks Ltd with reference to the media report appearing on https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/services/property-/-cstruction/nclt-allows-ilfs-transportation-networks-to-offload-shares-in-an-expressway-project/articleshow/110234663.cms (Source:https://economictimes.indiatimes.com) dated May 18, 2024, titled NCLT allows IL&FS Transportation Networks to offload shares in an expressway project

The Company is requested to submit its clarification to the Exchange in terms of the provisions of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: Intimation Pursuant To Regulation Reg. 32 SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations. 2015 (Listing Regulations)
data.news_body: We hereby confirm that there were no securities issued by the Company during the Financial Year ended March 31, 2024 and hence the provisions of Reg 32 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 is not applicable to the Company.

data.descriptor: Reg. 40 (10) - PCS Certificate for Transfer / Transmission / Transposition
data.caption: Submission Of Certificate Under Regulation 40(9) Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations,2015
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 40(9) read with Regulation 40(10) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith a certificate issued by the Practising  Company Secretary, M/s. Mehta & Mehta, Company Secretaries, for the Financial Year ended March 31, 2024.

data.caption: Compliance Certificate - Regulation 7(3) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 For The Financial Year Ended March 31, 2024.
data.news_body: As per the requirement of Regulation 7(3) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we hereby confirm that all activities in relation to both physical and electronic share transfer facility during the period April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024 (both days inclusive) are maintained by the Company''s RTA viz., Link Intime India Pvt. Ltd., a Category-I, Registrar & Share Transfer Agent, registered with SEBI vide registration Number: INR000004058

data.caption: IL&FS Transportation Networks Limited (The  Company) Has Informed The Exchange Regarding ''Filing Of The Draft Placement Memorandum With SEBI By Roadstar Infra Investment Trust For Listing Of The Units Issued To The Company''.
data.news_body: Roadstar Infra Private Limited (RIPL), a wholly owned subsidiary of the Company is the Sponsor of the Roadstar Infra Investment Trust (the Trust) settled on October 6, 2020 and under the Securities & Exchange Board of India (infrastructure Investment Trust) Regulation, 2014 (InvIT Regulations). The Trust has filed a Draft Placement Memorandum (DPM) with Securities and Exchange Board of India for listing of the units distributed to the Company and certain other IL&FS Group companies.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Diversification / Disinvestment
data.news_body: The Company has informed the exchange about Diversification/Disinvestment of the entire equity shareholding held by the Company in Karyavattom Sports Facilities Limited (KSFL), a wholly owned subsidiary of the Company. The Company has entered into Share Purchase Agreement (SPA) on February 27, 2024 with unincorporated consortium led by Premier International Convention Centre & Hotel, a partnership firm, to sell and transfer its holding in KSFL.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015
data.news_body: IL&FS Transportation Networks Limited has informed the Exchange regarding acceptance of Binding Offer to sell and transfer the entire equity shareholding held by the Company in Chenani Nashri Tunnelway Limited (CNTL), a wholly owned subsidiary of the Company.

data.caption: Outcome Of Postal Ballot And Scrutinizers Report
data.news_body: IL&FS Transportation Networks Limited has submitted the Exchange a copy of Scrutinizers Report of Postal Ballot. Further, the Company has informed the Exchange regarding Voting Results.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 47 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the copy of the Postal Ballot Notice published in  the following newspaper on December 16, 2023 to seek approval of Shareholders of the Company: i. The Financial Express (English) and ii. Navshakti (Marathi)

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Notice of Postal Ballot
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed Postal Ballot Notice mailed to the Shareholders today i.e. December 15, 2023 for seeking approval of the Members for the following proposals: 1. Appointment of Mr. Subrata Kumar Mitra (DIN: 00029961) as a Non-Executive, Non-Independent Director by way of Special Resolution and2. Appointment of Dr. Jagadip Narayan Singh (DIN: 00955107) as a Non-Executive, Non-Independent Director by way of Ordinary Resolution.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: IL&FS Transportation Networks Limited has informed the Exchange about the cessation of Mr. Subrata Kumar Mitra and Dr. Jagadip Narayan Singh as Independent Directors on completion of their term as such on November 30, 2023 and subsequently their appointment as Additional Directors (Non-Executive, Non-Independent) which shall be effective December 1, 2023.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Diversification / Disinvestment
data.news_body: The entire equity stake held by the Company in Jorabat Shillong Expressway Limited (JSEL), a wholly owned subsidiary of the Company has been sold/transferred to Sekura Roads Private Limited on November 16, 2023.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Diversification / Disinvestment
data.news_body: The entire equity shareholding held by the Company in Jorabat Shillong Expressway Limited (JSEL), a wholly owned subsidiary of the Company. The Company has entered into Restated Share Purchase Agreement(SPA) on October 19, 2023 with Sekura Roads Private Limited, to sell and transfer its holding in JSEL.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at their meeting held today, appointed Mr. Danny Samuel as Chief Executive Officer and Key Managerial Personnel of the Company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: The Board at its meeting today approved the following:(a) Implementation of Interim Distribution in accordance with the interim distribution order approved by Hon''ble NCLAT dated May 31, 2022(b) Fixed the Record Date as October 5, 2023 for the purpose of determining eligible Secured Debenture Holders in relation to payment of interim distribution  (c) Appointment of Mr. Danny Samuel as Chief Executive Officer and Key Managerial Personnel of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
data.news_body: IL&FS Transportation Networks Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Resignation of Mr. Dilip Bhatia as Chief Executive Officer of the Company effective closing of Business Hours of September 21, 2023

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Scheduled On September 22, 2023
data.news_body: IL&FS Transportation Networks Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 22/09/2023 ,inter alia, to consider and approve IL&FS Transportation Networks Limited has informed the Exchange regarding meeting of Board of Directors of the Company scheduled on Friday, September 22, 2023 to consider the following matters: (1)To consider and implement an interim distribution proposal in accordance with the interim distribution process approved by Hon''ble NCLAT vide order dated May 31, 2022(2)To fix the record date for payment of interim distribution to secured debenture holders

data.caption: Result Of Postal Ballot By Remote E-Voting Process
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 44(3) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed the voting results of the Postal Ballot along with the Scrutinizer''s Report thereon. Based on the report of the Scrutinizer, the aforementioned resolution has been passed by the Members with requisite majority.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and pursuant to 47(3) read with Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Please find enclosed copy of newspaper publication of 'Notice of Equity Shareholders of the Company, regarding transfer of Unclaimed Dividend /Shares to Investor Education & Protection Fund('IEPF') published in Financial Express and Navshakti on June 17, 2023.

data.caption: Compliances-Reg.24(A)-Annual Secretarial Compliance
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 24A of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Annual Secretarial Compliance Report issued by KDA & Associates (Formerly Known as KDT & Associates), Practicing Company Secretaries, for the Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2023.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 47 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the copy of Postal Ballot Notice published in the following newspaper on May 19, 2023 to seek approvalof Shareholders of the Company:i. The Financial Express (English) andii. Navshakti (Marathi)

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Notice of Postal Ballot
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed Postal Ballot Notice mailed to the Shareholders today i.e. May 18, 2023 for seeking approval of the Members for appointment of Dr. Rajeev Uberoi (DIN: 01731829) as an Independent Director.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Diversification / Disinvestment
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('SEBI Listing Regulations'), we hereby inform that the Board of Directors at its meeting held today approved the transfer of the entire shareholding in Pune Sholapur Road Development Company Limited (PSRDCL). Consequent to the above actions, PSRDCL has ceased to be the subsidiary of the Company effective today.

data.descriptor: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure
data.caption: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure A
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of CompanyIL&FS Transportation Networks Ltd
2CIN NO.L45203MH2000PLC129790
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December, as applicable (in Rs cr) 9034.88
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY D
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)ICRA LIMITED
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid, in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26, 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: Krishna Dhondu Ghag
Designation: Vice President and Company Secretary
EmailId: Krishna.Ghag@ilfsindia.com
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: Milind Ramesh Gandhi
Designation: Chief Financial Officer
EmailId: Milind.Gandhi@ilfsindia.com

Date: 24/04/2023

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular, beginning F.Y 2022, in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities, a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore, an entity identified as LC shall provide, in its initial disclosure for a financial year, the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held today has appointed Mr Milind Gandhi as Chief Financial Officer (CFO)& Key Managerial Personnel (KMP) effective October 1, 2022 in place of Mr. Mohit Bhasin, who ceased to be CFO and KMP of the Company effective September 30, 2022

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Cessation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform the cessation of Mr. Mohit Bhasin as Chief Financial Officer of the Company on completion of the employment contract effective September 30, 2022.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015- SEBI Adjudication Order Dated September 15, 2022
data.news_body: SEBI has issued an adjudication order dated September 15, 2022 in the matter of alleged violations  relating to certain disclosures pertaining to Related Party Transactions during FY 2015-16 to 2017-18 under the SEBI LODR.The Company is considering options to deal with this Order including filing of an appeal before the Securities Appellate Tribunal under advise from its Legal Counsels.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and pursuant to 47(3) read with Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Please find enclosed copy of newspaper publication of 'Notice of Equity Shareholders of the Company, regarding transfer of Unclaimed Dividend /Shares to Investor Education & Protection Fund('IEPF') published in Financial Express and Navshakti on June 28, 2021.As required under Regulation 46(2)(q) the said notices have also been placed on the Company's website at www.itnlindia.com and the members may refer to the same for details.Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure A
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of CompayIL&FS Transportation Networks Ltd
2CINL45203MH2000PLC129790
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December, as applicable (in Rs cr) 44757000000.00
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY D
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)Not Applicable
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid, in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26, 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: Krishna Ghag
Designation: Company Secretary and Vice President
EmailId: krishna.ghag@ilfsindia.com
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: Mohit Bhasin
Designation: Chief Financial Officer
EmailId: mohit.bhsin@ilfsindia.com

Date: 27/04/2022

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular, beginning F.Y 2022, in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities, a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore, an entity identified as LC shall provide, in its initial disclosure for a financial year, the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.
